document_data.name: Tarlask Mhorauk
document_data.mainbody: '''Tarlask Mhorauk''' was a member of the [[Council of Tarmalune|Council]] of [[Tarmalune]] as of [[1479 DR]].{{Cite dragon/372/Backdrop: Tarmalune|58}}
document_data.Background: In 1479 DR, Councilor Tarlask mysteriously vanished, after months of having been acting strangely. Other councilors claimed to have seen tentacles emerge from his mouth to strangle a thief who tried to rob him before his disappearance, but such claims were dismissed.
